general_info.summary: The Amity School of Fashion Technology provides professional education in the design, technology, and management of the fashion, textile, and apparel industries. Its goal is to equip students with the understanding and skills necessary to excel as professionals in the global fashion business environment, particularly within a liberalized textile economy.
general_info.raw_content: Amity School of Fashion Technology offers professional education in the field of Design, Technology & Management of fashion, textile and apparel industry. Amity School of Fashion Technology endeavors to create professionals who can understand the dynamics of global business environment of the fashion & apparel industry in post quota & liberalized textile economy. The objective of these programme is to inculcate in the students the aptitude and skills to work as professionals in various functional areas of Fashion & Apparel Industry.
